name: States&Capitals
0:
”Alexa, open state capitals”
”Alexa, ask state capitals to tell me a state capital”
”state capitals”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: state capitals
des: States and Capitals takes the guessing out of finding the Capital to a State in the U.S. It's simple, easily memorable phrases are very catchy. States and Capitals is great to teach with.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
